orgSetting.name: ActivateAdditionalRefreshOfWorkflowConditions
orgSetting.description: Default: False. True:

orgSetting.name: ActivityConvertDlgCampaignUnchecked
orgSetting.description: Controls the default value of the Record Closed Campaign Response option. When converting an activity to an opportunity this default option controls whether the source campaign is set or not. False - Record Closed Campaign Response checked and source campaign will be set. True - Record Closed Campaign Response not checked and source campaign is not set.

orgSetting.name: AddressBookMaterializedViewsEnabled
orgSetting.description: Changes the way the CRM Client queries SQL CE. Default: True. False: will disable address book materialized views.

orgSetting.name: AutoCreateContactOnPromote
orgSetting.description: Disables the ability for the entire organization to create contact records automatically when an email is tracked in CRM. This option can also be disabled from the user settings area for each user. False - Disables the auto creation of contacts. True - Enables the auto creation of contacts.

orgSetting.name: BackgroundSendBatchSize
orgSetting.description: Max email batch size per user for sending emails in the background. This sets the number of emails to download in one batch for the BackgroundSend API.

orgSetting.name: ChangeDoubleQuoteToSingleQuote
orgSetting.description: UR14 and UR11+ with a COD update: By default CRM has, historically, converted double quotes to single quotes. In UR14 the behavior in CRM changes to preserve double quotes in KB articles, use this setting to revert the behavior back to changing double quotes to single quotes (true)

orgSetting.name: ClientDisableTrackingForReplyForwardEmails
orgSetting.description: Default: 0. 1: disables tracking of replies and forwarded emails.

orgSetting.name: ClientUEIPDisabled
orgSetting.description: Disables the sending of customer experience feedback for the organization. This option can also be disabled from the user settings area for each user. False - Enables the sending. True - Disables the sending.

orgSetting.name: CreateSPFoldersUsingNameandGuid
orgSetting.description: Default: True - creates SharePoint folders using the format of {Name}+{GUID}. False: Creates SharePoint folders using just the name.

orgSetting.name: DisableIECompatMode
orgSetting.description: Changes the server-side, automatic, IE Compatability Mode Flag for Internet Explorer browsers. If you want pages to render in the most recent version of Internet Explorer set this to True. If you have form scripts or other cusotmizations that require earlier versions of Internet Explorer this should be set to False. This is also controlled via Settings | Administration | System Settings | Customization

orgSetting.name: DisableImplicitSharingOfCommunicationActivities
orgSetting.description: Default: False. True: disables implicit sharing of records to recipients that are added to existing activities.

orgSetting.name: DisableInactiveRecordFilterForMailMerge
orgSetting.description: When performing a mail merge inactive records are not included in the mail merge. This option allows you to override that functionality. False - Inactive records will not be included in the mail merge. True - Inactive records will be included in the mail merge.

orgSetting.name: DisableMapiCaching
orgSetting.description: Default: True. False: will disable address book materialized views.

orgSetting.name: DisableSmartMatching
orgSetting.description: Disables the smart matching functionality and relies on the tracking token on the incoming e-mails for e-mail tracking. False - Enables smart matching True - Disables smart matching

orgSetting.name: DoNotIgnoreInternalEmailToQueues
orgSetting.description: If you disable the "Track e-mail sent between CRM users as two activities" setting, e-mail messages from a CRM user to a queue are not delivered. Additionally, if a workflow rule sends an e-mail message to a queue, e-mail messages that are sent by the workflow rule are not delivered. False - Internal e-mail messages to queues will not be delivered. True - Internal e-mail messages to queues will be delivered.

orgSetting.name: EnableBulkReparent
orgSetting.description: Default: True. False: Disables and reparents using a one record at a time approach.

orgSetting.name: EnableQuickFindOptimization
orgSetting.description: For more information see the Optimizing the Performance of Quick Find Queries section in the Optimizing and Maintaining the Performance of a Dynamics CRM 2011 Server Infrastructure

orgSetting.name: EnableReLinkingToExistingCRMRecord
orgSetting.description: V6 Default: False. True:

orgSetting.name: EnableRetrieveMultipleOptimization
orgSetting.description: For more information see the Optimizing the Performance of Queries against Large Datasets section in the Optimizing and Maintaining the Performance of a Dynamics CRM 2011 Server Infrastructure

orgSetting.name: IdsCountBeforeUsingJoinsForSecurity
orgSetting.description: Not yet documented in optimization paper.

orgSetting.name: IdsCountForUsingGuidStringForSecurity
orgSetting.description: Not yet documented in optimization paper.

orgSetting.name: IfdAuthenticationMethod
orgSetting.description:
Changes the request sent to the ADFS server, this settings default value is NULL (which will not change anything). This changes the authentication when users access the org using the context https://orgName.domain.com/. Valid values are:
an empty string (to reset to NULL use reset to default).
urn:federation:authentication:windows as a value uses - Integrated auth
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password as a value uses - Forms

orgSetting.name: IntegratedAuthenticationMethod
orgSetting.description:
Changes the request sent to the ADFS server, this settings default value is NULL (which will not change anything). This changes the authentication when users access the org using the context https://internal.domain.com/org. Valid values are:
an empty string (to reset to NULL use reset to default).
urn:federation:authentication:windows as a value uses - Integrated auth
urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password as a value uses - Forms

orgSetting.name: JumpBarAlphabetOverride
orgSetting.description: Allows for customization of the Alphabet Bar for the CRM Application Grids for Microsoft Dynamics CRM

orgSetting.name: JumpBarNumberIndicatorOverride
orgSetting.description: Allows for customization of the Alphabet Bar for the CRM Application Grids for Microsoft Dynamics CRM

orgSetting.name: LookupNameMatchesDuringImport
orgSetting.description: Importing a solution that was created from an upgraded 4.0 deployment fails. Changing this setting makes the import look up the names for forms, views, workflows and security roles.

orgSetting.name: OverrideTrackInCrmBehaviour
orgSetting.description: When this option is Enabled the Track in CRM button will function like the Set Regarding button. 0 - Normal behavior of the Track in CRM button not having to set a Regarding record. 1 - Track in CRM will function like the Set Regarding and make you choose a regarding record.

orgSetting.name: OverrideV5SenderConflictResolution
orgSetting.description: When multiple records with the same e-mail address exist in the Dynamics CRM Organization and e-mail is auto tracked the e-mail is resolved to the record that was created first. This option allows you to override that functionality.False - E-mails are tracked to the first record created True - E-mails are not tracked automatically if there are multiple records with the same e-mail address.

orgSetting.name: RecordCountLimitToSwitchToCteSecuritySql
orgSetting.description: For more information see the Optimizing the Performance of Queries against Large Datasets section in the Optimizing and Maintaining the Performance of a Dynamics CRM 2011 Server Infrastructure. Warning: do not increase this value unless it's for a *very* specific reason.

orgSetting.name: RetrieveMultipleSharingCountThreshold
orgSetting.description: For more information see the Optimizing the Performance of Queries against Large Datasets section in the Optimizing and Maintaining the Performance of a Dynamics CRM 2011 Server Infrastructure

orgSetting.name: SendEmailSynchronously
orgSetting.description: If you have a plugin registered on the e-mail send flow you will want to update this setting to 1.0 - E-mail is sent asynchronously 1 - E-mail is sent synchronously

orgSetting.name: SetRegardingLookupDefaultEntityType
orgSetting.description: Change default entity for Regarding Lookup Dialog

orgSetting.name: SharingLimitForPOASnapshotTable
orgSetting.description: Not yet documented in optimization paper.

orgSetting.name: SkipGettingRecordCountForPaging
orgSetting.description: Disables the record count query. This query is responsible for getting the total number of records returned for each view. This query can cause longer search times and may lead to SQL timeouts or Exceptions. False - Enables record count on views. True - Disables record count on views.

orgSetting.name: SkipSuffixOnKBArticles
orgSetting.description: When you create a knowledge base (KB) article the KB article number uses the "Prefix-Number-Suffix" format. You expect the format to be "Prefix-Number." For more info see KB: 981840

orgSetting.name: TabletClientMaxFields
orgSetting.description: Default: 75. Max mobile fields.

orgSetting.name: TabletClientMaxLists
orgSetting.description: Default: 10. Max tablet lists.

orgSetting.name: TabletClientMaxTabs
orgSetting.description: Default: 5. Max tablet tabs.

orgSetting.name: TraceExchangeSyncData
orgSetting.description: Default: False. True: Enabled exchange sync tracing.

orgSetting.name: UsePlainTextForEmailTemplateBody
orgSetting.description: Will set CRM to send emails with only plain text instead of HTML text.

orgSetting.name: VerboseErrorsOnPromoteToCRM
orgSetting.description: Enables verbose user error messaging when tracking items from Outlook to Dynamics CRM. By default some error messages during the tracking are suppressed from being shown to the end user and this setting enables those errors to be shown. 0 - Disables the verbose errors. 1 - Enables the verbose errors.

orgSetting.name: AllowPromoteDuplicates
orgSetting.description:
V6 Default: False. Options are: False: Does not allow for the promotion of duplicate records. True: Allows for the promotion of duplicate records.
NOTE: This setting is NOT SUPPORTED IN CRM2013 as of build 809.

orgSetting.name: ClearSystemUserPrincipalsWhenDisable
orgSetting.description: Clear and/or populates SystemUserPrincipals values for systemUsers when they're disabled/enabled. Default: True. False:

orgSetting.name: GrantSharedAccessForMergeToSubordinateOwner
orgSetting.description:
Added back in 6.1.0.581! Default: true. Options are:
true:Copy all inhertied shares from master share records
false: Do not copy master records inherited shares.

orgSetting.name: ListComponentInstalled
orgSetting.description:
Added back in 6.1.0.581! If CRM and SharePoint use ADFS and users click to create a folder for a record in CRM 2013, intermittently, the SharePoint page is shown instead of the list part grid page causing confusion with users. This setting allows you to force CRM to use the installed list grid component in SharePoint when using ADFS.
Default: false. Options are:
false: use the standard method of detecting Sharepoint Authentication
true: If CRM and SharePoint have ADFS enabled, force CRM to use the grid display.

orgSetting.name: SecuritySettingForEmail
orgSetting.description:
Added back in 6.1.0.581! Default: 1. Options are:
1:Display a Warning Message And give an option to open
2: Display a Warning Message and do not give an option to open
3: Do not display a Warning Message and do not give any option to open.
NOTE: This setting is NOT SUPPORTED IN CRM2013 as of build 809.

orgSetting.name: StoreOutlookSyncDataInSensitivityProperty
orgSetting.description:
Added back in 6.1.0.581! Default: true. Options are:
true:Preserve existing behavior.
false: Stop storing CRM Sync information in the PidTagSensitivity MAPI property which causes the error: error in the XML document on GetItem for IPM.MSCRMUserId on BlackerBerry Server Traces.

orgSetting.name: DefaultHeightForWizardReports
orgSetting.description: UR14: With a default value 0: CRM will use 8.25 inches (A4), any other double value will override the default of 8.25. Some printers may reject printed reports if the height is any less than the height of the paper loaded in the tray, this setting will override the height used.

orgSetting.name: DisableLookupMruOnOutlookOffline
orgSetting.description: LookupMRUItems in UserEntityUISettings can cause a large data volume when going online, setting this to true will stop MRU's from syncing back ONLINE. The default of false will have users OFFLINE outlook clients sync the MRU items back to the server after being offline. To reduce the time taken to go back ONLINE for offline client users you can set this to true.

orgSetting.name: EnableCrmStatecodeOnOutlookCategory
orgSetting.description: Enable Statecode data on contact sync. Default: True. False:

orgSetting.name: GrantFullAccessForMergeToMasterOwner
orgSetting.description: Previous less desirable behavior will default to true, to preserve existing functionality. The more desirable behavior is achieved with the setting of: false. Details: When two records owned by the same team are merged, the final record is shared with the owner of the record it was merged from. This creates redundant POA records, as a result, if the owner of the record is changed in the future it will be visible to team members of the previously owning team.

orgSetting.name: DisableNavTour
orgSetting.description: Override the navigation tour setting for the entire Organization this allows you to permanently disable the welcome screen shown to users when they first login to CRM - if this is set to false, a user will be shown the navigation tour every time their browser cookies expire or are cleared and when they login to CRM from an unkown browser (like on a shared PC or different computer).

orgSetting.name: MakeSocialPanePhoneCallCompleted
orgSetting.description: By default (true) Phone calls created in the Social Pane are automatically marked in a completed state and cannot be edited. Changing this value to TRUE will create phone calls and will NOT mark them as completed.

orgSetting.name: ClearSystemUserPrincipalsWhenDisable
orgSetting.description: Clear and/or populates SystemUserPrincipals values for systemUsers when they're disabled/enabled. Default: True. False:

orgSetting.name: DisableLookupMruOnOutlookOffline
orgSetting.description: LookupMRUItems in UserEntityUISettings can cause a large data volume when going online, setting this to true will stop MRU's from syncing back ONLINE. The default of false will have users OFFLINE outlook clients sync the MRU items back to the server after being offline. To reduce the time taken to go back ONLINE for offline client users you can set this to true.

orgSetting.name: GrantFullAccessForMergeToMasterOwner
orgSetting.description: Previous less desirable behavior will default to true, to preserve existing functionality. The more desirable behavior is achieved with the setting of: false. Details: When two records owned by the same team are merged, the final record is shared with the owner of the record it was merged from. This creates redundant POA records, as a result, if the owner of the record is changed in the future it will be visible to team members of the previously owning team.

orgSetting.name: DisableLookupMruOnOutlookOffline
orgSetting.description: LookupMRUItems in UserEntityUISettings can cause a large data volume when going online, setting this to true will stop MRU's from syncing back ONLINE. The default of false will have users OFFLINE outlook clients sync the MRU items back to the server after being offline. To reduce the time taken to go back ONLINE for offline client users you can set this to true.

orgSetting.name: HierarchyLevelForHierarchyFeature
orgSetting.description: HierarchyLevelForHierarchyFeature - the hierarchy level used for hierarchal security.

orgSetting.name: MaximumChildUsersCountLimitBeforeUsingJoinForHSM
orgSetting.description: Maximum Child/Subordinate Users Count Before Using a Join For HSM

orgSetting.name: MinRowCountForFKIndexCreateInReferencedEntity
orgSetting.description: Setting min row count in referenced table for ForeignKey index creation

orgSetting.name: MinRowCountForFKIndexCreateInReferencingEntity
orgSetting.description: Setting min row count in referencing table for ForeignKey index creation

orgSetting.name: PageSizeForHierarchyFeature
orgSetting.description: PageSizeForHierarchyFeature - the hierarchy page size used for hierarchal security.

orgSetting.name: EnableAppointmentBroadcastingForOutlookSync
orgSetting.description: Setting for Appointment broadcasting for Outlook Synchronization

orgSetting.name: GrantFullAccessForMergeToMasterOwner
orgSetting.description: Previous less desirable behavior will default to true, to preserve existing functionality. The more desirable behavior is achieved with the setting of: false. Details: When two records owned by the same team are merged, the final record is shared with the owner of the record it was merged from. This creates redundant POA records, as a result, if the owner of the record is changed in the future it will be visible to team members of the previously owning team.

orgSetting.name: OutlookClientEmailTaggerEnabled
orgSetting.description: WARNING!!! - read this carefully as there are 3 values for this Boolean setting - true, false, and NULL (which is the value when NOT set - to get back to NULL, simply remove this settings by clicking Remove in the edit box). TRUE: Will override any and all client registry setting to True. FALSE: Will override any and all client registry setting to False. NULL: If the setting is NULL the outlook clients will use whatever is in the registry of the client. TO SET THIS VALUE TO NULL YOU WILL NEED TO CLICK EDIT, THEN REMOVE THE VALUE TO HAVE IT DEFAULT TO NULL.

orgSetting.name: DefaultHeightForWizardReports
orgSetting.description: UR14: With a default value 0: CRM will use 8.25 inches (A4), any other double value will override the default of 8.25. Some printers may reject printed reports if the height is any less than the height of the paper loaded in the tray, this setting will override the height used.

orgSetting.name: ReassignAllExtendedTimeout
orgSetting.description: Increase script timeout for reassigning all records of a user or team - this allows you to exceed the default extended timeout value. Default extended timeout is 1000000 ms (roughly 15 minutes). WARNING: Care should be taken when increasing this value above the default - always double check the number of minutes before setting this to a value higher than the default.

orgSetting.name: ExportedExcelRetentionWindow
orgSetting.description: 7.1: The number of days to temporarily store Excel exported Office Document Records. 30 days max was selected arbitrarily as this is only a cache. Must be at least 2.

orgSetting.name: OfficeDocumentPersistenceTimeInDays
orgSetting.description: 7.1: The number of days to temporarily store Office Document Records. 30 days max was selected arbitrarily as this is only a cache.

orgSetting.name: OutlookSyncDataSubscriptionClientsBatchSize
orgSetting.description: 7.1: This setting is used to determine how many record changes (deletes, inserts, and updates) to send back to a syncing client for each request.

orgSetting.name: DefaultHeightForWizardReports
orgSetting.description: UR14: With a default value 0: CRM will use 8.25 inches (A4), any other double value will override the default of 8.25. Some printers may reject printed reports if the height is any less than the height of the paper loaded in the tray, this setting will override the height used.

orgSetting.name: DisableClientUpdateNotification
orgSetting.description: Setting DisableClientUpdateNotification to true will disable the outlook client from checking for newer versions.

orgSetting.name: DisableNavTour
orgSetting.description: Override the navigation tour setting for the entire Organization this allows you to permanently disable the welcome screen shown to users when they first login to CRM - if this is set to false, a user will be shown the navigation tour every time their browser cookies expire or are cleared and when they login to CRM from an unkown browser (like on a shared PC or different computer).

orgSetting.name: ReassignAllExtendedTimeout
orgSetting.description: Increase script timeout for reassigning all records of a user or team - this allows you to exceed the default extended timeout value. Default extended timeout is 1000000 ms (roughly 15 minutes). WARNING: Care should be taken when increasing this value above the default - always double check the number of minutes before setting this to a value higher than the default.

orgSetting.name: MailboxStatisticsPersistenceTimeInDays
orgSetting.description: If value is 0, dont store ANY MailboxStatistics Data, if the value is greater than zero then store that number of days statistics data. Max value arbitrarily chosen at 1 year, this generates at lot of data so 1 year should be plenty of time.

orgSetting.name: SortEmailsByReceivedOn
orgSetting.description: When the Activities tab of the social pane is show, the data ordered by the 'modifiedon' date in descending order, toggling this setting to True will enable the social pane to sort emails by RecievedOn Desc instead of modifiedon.

orgSetting.name: MailboxStatisticsPersistenceTimeInDays
orgSetting.description: If value is 0, dont store ANY MailboxStatistics Data, if the value is greater than zero then store that number of days statistics data. Max value arbitrarily chosen at 1 year, this generates at lot of data so 1 year should be plenty of time.

orgSetting.name: SecurityQueryHint
orgSetting.description: Used to hint the query within GetRightsFromPrincipalObjectAccess. 0=None; 1=Recompile (default); 2=OptimizeForUnkown

orgSetting.name: DisableClientUpdateNotification
orgSetting.description: Setting DisableClientUpdateNotification to true will disable the outlook client from checking for newer versions.

orgSetting.name: DisableNavTour
orgSetting.description: Override the navigation tour setting for the entire Organization this allows you to permanently disable the welcome screen shown to users when they first login to CRM - if this is set to false, a user will be shown the navigation tour every time their browser cookies expire or are cleared and when they login to CRM from an unkown browser (like on a shared PC or different computer).

orgSetting.name: MakeSocialPanePhoneCallCompleted
orgSetting.description: By default (true) Phone calls created in the Social Pane are automatically marked in a completed state and cannot be edited. Changing this value to TRUE will create phone calls and will NOT mark them as completed.

orgSetting.name: UseCrmOrganizerForEmptyExchangeOrganizer
orgSetting.description: Tells CRM to use the appointments 'CRM' information as the organizer of an Appointment if the Organizer information doesnt exist/cannot be found in Exchange.

orgSetting.name: SkipGettingRecordCountForPagingForAudit
orgSetting.description: This setting will disable the total record count for audit queries.

orgSetting.name: SolutionExportExtendedTimeout
orgSetting.description: This setting makes it possible to override the solution export timeout, this setting is in milliseconds and the default platform timeout is 1000000ms (about 16 minutes). If this setting is set to any number LESS than the extendedTimeout value will be ignored and the extendedTimeout will be used instead. This setting will ensure your timeout is at least this number of ms long.

orgSetting.name: TraceLogPersistenceTimeInDays
orgSetting.description: Setting for (mailbox) TraceLog persistence Time in Days - this is only for mailbox trace logs.

orgSetting.name: UseOrganizationServiceForMultiEntityQuickFind
orgSetting.description: Forces the use of the organization service when executing a multi entity quickfind which will ensure all plugins are fired upon quickfind operations

orgSetting.name: ForceRetrievePublishedMetadataForRetrieveAllEntities
orgSetting.description: Not available

orgSetting.name: FullTextSpecialCharactersToRemoveFromSearchToken
orgSetting.description: Special characters to remove from the full text search token (available in onprem only today), default is none.

orgSetting.name: officeShellServiceTimeout
orgSetting.description: Default 5 seconds. Override time (in seconds) to wait for the office shell service to respond upon rendering the main UI.

orgSetting.name: DistinctPhysicalAndLogicalDeletesForExchangeSync
orgSetting.description:
Default False. Server-Side synchronization mechanism to distinguish between Logical and Physical deletes of records in CRM False: *DEFAULT* No distinction between physical and logical deletes for exchange sync delete scenario. True: Physical and logical deletes will be distinguished for exchange sync record deletions.

Example: Jayne has Server-Side synchronization (SSS) enabled and tracked appointment 'bike repair' in CRM. If Jayne lost read access to 'bike repair' (logical delete of 'bike repair' for Jayne), then SSS with default behavior will delete 'bike repair' from Exchange. With DistinctPhysicalAndLogicalDeletesForExchangeSync==true, logical deletions of 'bike repair' for Jayne will NOT delete 'bike repair' from Exchange.

orgSetting.name: DefaultHeightForWizardReports
orgSetting.description: UR14: With a default value 0: CRM will use 8.25 inches (A4), any other double value will override the default of 8.25. Some printers may reject printed reports if the height is any less than the height of the paper loaded in the tray, this setting will override the height used.

orgSetting.name: UseOrganizationServiceForMultiEntityQuickFind
orgSetting.description: Forces the use of the organization service when executing a multi entity quickfind which will ensure all plugins are fired upon quickfind operations

orgSetting.name: DefaultHeightForWizardReports
orgSetting.description: UR14: With a default value 0: CRM will use 8.25 inches (A4), any other double value will override the default of 8.25. Some printers may reject printed reports if the height is any less than the height of the paper loaded in the tray, this setting will override the height used.

orgSetting.name: RestrictIRMEmailItems
orgSetting.description: Setting value to TRUE will result in Server Side Sync NOT synchronizing ALL emails that are marked as IRM emails.Default value is set to False to preserve the existing behavior. To enable this restriction on the organization RestrictIRMEmailItems should be set to True.

orgSetting.name: AutoTrackSentFolderItems
orgSetting.description: Setting value to TRUE will result in Server Side Sync auto tracking of emails from Sent Items. Default value is set to False to preserve the existing behavior. To enable functionality on the organization AutoTrackSentFolderItems should be set to True.

orgSetting.name: ForceRetrievePublishedMetadataForRetrieveAllEntities
orgSetting.description: Not available

orgSetting.name: DistinctPhysicalAndLogicalDeletesForExchangeSync
orgSetting.description: Setting value to TRUE will result in Server Side Sync NOT deleting an appointment when system detects auto changes that result in change of ownership. Appointment will persists in soft delete scenario. Default value is set to False to preserve the existing behavior. To enable functionality on the organization DistinctPhysicalAndLogicalDeletesForExchangeSync should be set to True.

orgSetting.name: MaxRecordsForExportToExcel
orgSetting.description: Max number of records to export to Excel, the larger the number the longer the exports will take (generally).

orgSetting.name: AllowClientMessageBarAd
orgSetting.description: Enables or disables Outlook Client message bar advertisement.

orgSetting.name: ExpireSubscriptionsInDays
orgSetting.description: Max number of days before deleting inactive Outlook client subscriptions. We recommend you keep this to the default unelss you absolutely need to change it, be mindful of keeping the tracking info too long, or deleting it too soon.

orgSetting.name: ExpireChangeTrackingInDays
orgSetting.description: Maximum number of days to keep change tracking deleted record ID's - you want this value larger than the max# of days any change tracking dependant services sync with your system. Default is 30 days. .

orgSetting.name: MaximumActiveBusinessProcessFlowsAllowedPerEntity
orgSetting.description: Max number of business process flows per entity allowed. WARNING: if the value is greater than 10, you may see a decrease in your system’s performance when you switch processes or open a record that has an assigned business process flow. This may be especially noticeable if processes span multiple entities.

orgSetting.name: YammerGroupId
orgSetting.description: WARNING: This is used only to view your Yammer settings, you may remove the Yammer settings if you need to fall back to activity feeds, though this is recommended mostly for POC/Test CRM instances.

orgSetting.name: YammerNetworkPermalink
orgSetting.description: WARNING: This is used only to view your Yammer settings, you may remove the Yammer settings if you need to fall back to activity feeds, though this is recommended mostly for POC/Test CRM instances.

orgSetting.name: YammerOAuthAccessTokenExpired
orgSetting.description: WARNING: This is used only to view your Yammer settings, you may remove the Yammer settings using the button below only if you need to fall back to using activity feeds, though this is recommended mostly for POC/Test CRM instances.
